name: PHP Mail
tagline: PHP mail with validation and captcha.
body:
# PHP Mail
Many of my friends that have little problem with PHP mail, this is for you.
This PHP mail have validation and as well the power of captch.You just include mail.php and apply mail.css that's all.Put valid.js and captcha.js in js folder.That's it.
Feel free to use and send requests or bugs any found @ kuberjsr[at]gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
